scripts.beautify: ls ./jsdsa/*.js  | while read i; do ./node_modules/js-beautify/js/bin/js-beautify.js -r -n $i; done;
scripts.jshint: ls ./jsdsa/*.js | grep -v "format.js" | while read i; do echo Checking $i && $jshint $i; if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then exit jshintError; fi; done;
scripts.test: cd tests; for i in *.js; do echo Testing $i && node $i; if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then exit testError; fi; done
